entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7 with temperature rising to minus 2 by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Periods of snow beginning near midnight. Local amount 2 cm. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 7 with temperature rising to minus 2 by morning. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 4:28 PM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Risk of freezing drizzle in the morning. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the afternoon. Wind becoming south 20 late in the afternoon. Temperature steady near zero. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:28 PM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Temperature steady near plus 2.
